entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 5:11 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and rain changing to rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
